name: ice-body
caption: Ice Body

effect.short: Heals for 1/16 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} after each turn during hail.  Protects against hail damage.
effect.full: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum [HP]{mechanic:hp} after each turn during [hail]{mechanic:hail}, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.

flavorText: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.
